snippet: Paul A. Volcker told the Senate Banking Committee that the influence of a ban on proprietary trading went "far beyond the particular risks" and that it also addressed "a cultural issue" on Wall Street.
abstract: Paul A. Volcker told the Senate Banking Committee that the influence of a ban on proprietary trading went "far beyond the particular risks" and that it also addressed "a cultural issue" on Wall Street.

headline.main: Volcker Defends a Rule Bearing His Name

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
